glsa.title: Commons-BeanUtils: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: Apache Commons BeanUtils does not properly suppress the class property, which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Commons-beanutils provides easy-to-use wrappers around Reflection and Introspection APIs

description.p: Apache Commons BeanUtils does not suppress the class property, which allows for the manipulation of the ClassLoader.

impact.p: Remote attackers could potentially execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Commons BeanUtils users should upgrade to the latest version:
